resources.string:
"Geek Out! is a party game that can determine once and for all which player is the most knowledgeable about your favorite pop culture subjects!

"
"This game will involve two players. A host-player and a guest-player"
"The host-player is given an ID. This ID will be used by the guest-player to join the hosts' game as an opponent

"
"When both players are ready, they host-player can go ahead and hit Start Game! then Go!

"
"When the round, each player receives a question asking them to list things which fall under a certain category: comic books, fantasy, games, science fiction, and miscellaneous!

"
"For each round, both players will have 30 seconds each to come up with as many answers as possible!

"
"For every correct answer put in by a player, one point is awarded!

"
"At the end of the round, the player with the highest score is crowned the winner of that round!

"
"After each round, you can hit Play Again to start a new round or Quit to return to the start screen

"
"Have fun GEEKING OUT!

"
Enter your answers. Press the Enter-Key after each answer
